content.text:
# Analysis of Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The structure consists of approximately 18 building blocks organized in multiple layers:
- Bottom layer: Yellow rectangular blocks and orange cylindrical pillars
- Middle layer: Yellow rectangular blocks forming platforms
- Top layer: Red archway structure with orange triangular roof pieces
- Side component: A small "cart" with yellow base, orange cylindrical wheels, and blue/red cube blocks on top

## Spatial Relationships
- Main structure: 4 vertical orange cylinders support yellow rectangular platforms
- Yellow rectangular blocks are placed horizontally as platforms at the bottom and middle of the structure
- On the right platform sits a red archway structure with an orange triangular roof
- To the left, a separate cart-like structure has 2 horizontal orange cylinders as wheels, with yellow rectangular blocks as the cart bed, topped with a blue cube and red cube

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

1. Bottom structure base:
   - 2× Yellow rectangular blocks horizontal (#8)
   - 4× Orange cylindrical blocks vertical (#10)
   
2. Middle platform:
   - 3× Yellow rectangular blocks horizontal (#8)
   
3. House structure:
   - 1× Red archway block (#1)
   - 3× Orange triangular roof pieces (one #14, one #15, and one #16)
   
4. Cart structure:
   - 2× Yellow rectangular blocks horizontal (#8)
   - 2× Orange cylindrical blocks horizontal (#11)
   - 1× Blue cubic block (#4)
   - 1× Red cubic block (#7)

# Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 8
   Step2: Move block with index 8
   Step3: Move block with index 10
   Step4: Move block with index 10
   Step5: Move block with index 10
   Step6: Move block with index 10
   Step7: Move block with index 8
   Step8: Move block with index 8
   Step9: Move block with index 8
   Step10: Move block with index 1
   Step11: Move block with index 14
   Step12: Move block with index 15
   Step13: Move block with index 16
   Step14: Move block with index 8
   Step15: Move block with index 8
   Step16: Move block with index 11
   Step17: Move block with index 11
   Step18: Move block with index 4
   Step19: Move block with index 7
}
```
